content: **sizes ** preemie newborn baby toddler child teen adult s m l to fit a head circumference approx 15 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23 / 38 40 5 43 45 5 48 51 53 56 58 5 cm **yarn** dk weight yarn for the hat approx 75 80 85 100 110 130 155 175 195 yards / 70 75 80 90 100 120 140 160 180 meters for the pom pom approx 18 yards / 16 meters **needles** us 5 3 75 mm and us 3 3 25 mm circular needle 32 / 80 cm for magic looping or 16 / 40 cm circular needle and double pointed needles or needle size that gives you the gauge and another needle two sizes smaller than gauge needle **notions ** a stitch marker a blunt tapestry needle cardboard for the pom pom optional ***ohje myös suomeksi ***
